post_text:
Today, I conducted an oversight visit of the Aurora ICE detention facility.

Now more than ever, we need more oversight—not less.

I won’t stop fighting for access, transparency, and accountability at every level of our immigration system.

replies.text: Keep calling, y'all.
Yep, oversight of concentration camps is definitely what defeated the Nazis.

Michael Bennet has voted to approve trump's cabinet nominees 8 times and doesn't support universal health care.  He is way too moderate to be Colorado's senator or governor.

ballotpedia.org/How_senators...

You want ICE to continue existing, that just confirms that you are a Nazi just like Trump and Schumer.

Resign in shame.

The only facilities we need for ICE are court rooms and prison cells for when we make the nuremburg trials look like amature hour. We will put you on trial too, get a lawyer.
And.
So, what did you find?  Did you talk to any detainees?  Their lawyers?  Their families?

Thanks. For the sake of the innocent lives they want to torture in the future, do not approve one more cent for Noem & this violent lawless force. Schumer’s weak statement today was horrifying. Does he not understand what this is? They’re murdering & torturing people (kids!) w/ no consequence.
Now work to close it. ^_^

No more funding, no CR, no nothing. Nothing has changed. Who will provide oversight? Homan ? Noem? DOJ?. They were funded by the big bs bill. Why do they need more funding to terrorize people illegally?

Thanks for providing oversight. Please work to abolish ICE, it’s just a standing army for the executive branch, the corruption is too rampant now to reform. Please make it so they can’t get any more beds or centers built here in Colorado! We are behind you. Thanks for your anti corruption work too 🙏
That’s great - now go be fucking loud back in Washington - disrupt everything! It’s getting worse and snowballing - I feel lucky I’m in CO but worry a bigger wave will be here soon
Then support abolishing ice
Thank you! 😊
You have to say it with your whole entire chest-ABOLISH ICE. If not, your constituents won't supoort your next election.
Do more! Shut them down!

How about you fight against funding a force that is murdering people in the streets? If you still think you can give 'oversight' to this administration, you're delusional. Dismantling ICE is the moderate position. The Overton Window is so far to the right you're just controlled opposition now.

There is no uniform survey  or auditing method used for the ICE detention centers such as used by The International Committee of the Red Cross or UNHCR Ad hoc Congressional member visits are appreciated, but if you are not using reliable survey methods, the visits will appear to be partisan.

And? What were the conditions? What did you see? How are the human beings kept there being treated? Did you actually talk to any of the detainees? Are there any children there? How were you treated?  How much did you actually get to see? Do you not think your constituents care about details? We do!

Thanks for doing that. 

Please do not vote in such a way that 2-3 weeks down the road some ICE murder or kidnapping can be considered enabled by your vote.  That's the bottom line.  Don't you be one of the senators that enables outrageous, unconstitutional abuses.
Umm, what did you find?
